title: Bug 2221New wizard disables Finish even with valid selection (1GEAPG3)
description: Open the New wizard dialog. Select Basic and then File. Notice the finish button is enabled now. Click on Basic again and notice theFinish button is disabled even thought File is still selected in the list.NOTES:NE (05/28/01 2:32:52 PM)It's the Next button, not the Finish button.
